Text: Tak i leatu o̩jo̩ uñmi ekeji kʼowñ alalegu ef uche̩ o̩ka du; oñ amako̩che̩-wñ jʼoji-o̩ka da, ma muko li o̩wo̩-ma, oñ ma kwolo̩.
Ama amaFarisi iche̩kibo̩ kakini, E̩wñ chi ku me̩ che e̩wñ kʼo̩da ma je̩ ku ma che o̩jo̩ uñmi n?
Taku Jisua dohi ñwu ma kakini, I chaka chʼe̩wñ ku Defid che e̩gba kʼebi kpʼo̩, owñ chʼowñ kpai abo ku ma jʼugbo-wñ, me̩ cho̩kalatu e-le̩ ta n?
alu kʼi gudu tef unyi O̩jo̩ kʼi la mʼakala ku ma ko te̩ jʼo̩mo̩ gba je̩, kʼi laño̩ ko ñw abo ku ma jʼugbo-wñ ge̩; owñ chʼe-kʼo̩da ma je̩ ñw one̩ je̩ n, chai amatama O̩jo̩ kate?
Tak i ka ñwu ma kakini, O̩ma One̩ chʼOndu o̩jo̩ uñmi.
Oñ i leatu o̩jo̩ uñmi omune̩ i mugudu tef unyi ujeju oñ i ko̩ amone̩ e̩wñ; e̩ne̩ʼka la dʼane̩ o̩me̩ kʼo̩wo̩-wñ awo̩to̩ che̩gbe̩.
Tak amako̩takada kpʼabo Farisi fʼeju mʼu ne̩ tode̩gba kʼi ache o̩ga one̩ o̩jo̩ uñmi; todu ku ma ki li e̩wñ ku ma du gwajo̩nʼo.
Owñ muda ma ibe ki dʼef uma, oñ i ka ñw e̩ne̩ kʼo̩wo̩-wñ gbe̩ le̩ kakini, Kwane̩ wa kʼe̩ dago alumeji-i. Tak i kwane̩ wa adago.
Taku Jisus ka ñwu ma kakini, Ene natu-i kakini, O̩da aje̩ ñw one̩ che e̩nyo̩ o̩jo̩ uñmi abe̩ku ma chʼe̩bie̩ne̩? Ejadu oji one̩ abe̩k edutinyo̩?
Tak i rejuda go ma chaka lale, oñ i ka ñw e̩ne̩ le̩ kakini, Fʼo̩wo̩-we̩ nadala. Tak i fʼabe̩le̩ che, oñ o̩wo̩-wñ mudabi tiko.
Tak ibe takpa rʼuma efu nʼoji uwe̩do̩ ki kʼuma efu; ma la kwolo kpʼomune̩ e̩wñ ku ma ache Jisus.
Oñ ileatu iko le̩ i kwodufu nyʼibe̩uwo kʼi chadua; i la do̩mo̩ achadua ñw O̩jo̩ gbogbo ñw o̩jo̩.
Tak e̩gba kʼo̩jo̩ muñwa, i fʼamako̩che̩-wñ do̩ wa; oñ i fʼone̩ me̩gweji chi efu ma; i ño̩ dʼodu abo le̩ ko ame̩nukpuche̩.
Ama che Saimo̩n e-ki ño̩ dʼodu-wñ ko̩ Pita, kpai Anduru o̩maye-wñ, kpai Jeme̩s kpai Jo̩n, kpai Filip kpai Barto̩lomiu,
kpai Matiu kpai To̩mas, kpai Jeme̩s e-Alfio̩s, kpai Saimo̩n ku ma ño̩ du ko̩ Ago̩laru e̩wñ,
kpai Judas e-Jeme̩s, kpai Judas Iskario̩t e-ki mʼowñ du ñw amone̩ mu.

Tak owñ kpʼama mugwo̩ru wa, oñ i kwodago ugbo ki de̩ te̩e̩le̩, tak o̩wo̩ amako̩che̩-wñ lile kpai ugwe̩ko̩ amone̩ wewe ki kwo Judia du kpai Je̩rusale̩m kpʼo̩lʼomi ane̩ Taya kpai Saido̩n ku ma wa ku ma gbʼo̩la-wñ, todu kʼi ño̩ fʼuma o̩ga chekpa.
Tak o̩la abo kʼamafu ki ma de̩hiolo n fu ma chawuya takpa.
O̩wo̩-amone̩ le̩ chaka la tene ku ma dʼo̩wo̩ kadʼo; todabu kʼukpahiu kwʼo̩la-wñ dufu achʼo̩ga-o̩la-ma kpa chaka.
Tak i chi eju-wñ go amako̩che̩-wñ, oñ i kakini:
Ame̩ kʼebi akpa me̩ fai gbede, todabu kʼefu-me̩ ako̩. Ame̩ ku me̩ raku fai gbede, todabu ku me̩ anya-nyi.
Me̩ gbede, e̩gba kʼamone̩ achulaka me̩, kpai e̩gba ku ma fʼume̩ date̩ bʼo̩la-ma te̩ ku ma la kicha ñwu me̩, ku ma la dʼodu-me̩ tinyo̩ dabe̩ne̩ kʼe̩wñ bibi tod O̩ma One̩.
Me̩ nayo̩ o̩jo̩ le̩, me̩ ki kpakolo nyʼojale noj uyo̩; todu go, e̩wñ uro̩me̩-me̩ chenana efojale; todu abe̩le̩ gbage̩de̩ oñ amata-ma che amakache̩.
Ama atogwo ñwu me̩ ku me̩ chʼanana! todabu ku me̩ jʼagba e̩wñ ugbe̩do̩ e-me̩.
Atogwo ñwu me̩, kʼefu-me̩ ko̩ abajo̩-i! todabu kʼebi akpa me̩. Atogwo ñwu me̩, ku me̩ nyanyi abajo̩-i! todabu ku me̩ adaido̩, me̩ la araku.
Atogwo ñwu me̩ e̩gba kʼamone̩ jʼakele me̩! todu abe̩le̩ gbage̩de̩ oñ amata-ma che amakache̩ olemi.
U muda aka ñw ame̩ ku me̩ jʼagbʼo̩la-i kakini, Me̩ nafe̩do̩ ame̩nebi-me̩; me̩ ki che e̩wñ o̩me̩me̩le̩ ñw abo ku ma chulaka me̩;
me̩ je̩nyu ñw abo ku ma nama ñwu me̩, me̩ chadua tod abo ku ma jʼabʼume̩ ina akpʼume̩ bie̩.
E̩ne̩ ki kʼuwe̩ awo itiʼka, e̩ ño̩ mʼe-ekeji du te̩ ñw u ge̩; e̩ne̩ ki bʼe̩ gbʼotogbo-we̩, e̩ ki ko̩ edʼafe̩-we̩ manyu ñw u n kpo̩fo̩.
E̩ne̩ du ki bi we̩ e̩wñ e̩ nadu ñw u; e̩ne̩ ki mʼane̩-we̩ gba, e̩ ki bi ugbo-wñ ge̩ n.
Oñ alu ki dʼume̩ e̩do̩ kʼamone̩ ki che ñwu me̩, ame̩ ki nache ñwu ma abe̩le̩ ge̩.
Iche̩wñ ku me̩ fe̩do̩ abo ku ma fe̩do̩ me̩, ugbo ugwa-me̩ de̩? todu i chaka chʼame̩nadure, ma fe̩do̩ abo ku ma fe̩do̩ ma.
I la che̩wñ ku me̩ chʼe̩nyo̩ ñw abo ku ma chʼe̩nyo̩ ñwu me̩, ugwa e̩wñ ma agwa me̩? todu i chaka chʼame̩nadure, ma che e-le̩.
I laño̩ che̩wñ ku me̩ me̩ e̩wñ ñw abo ku me̩ kibeno ka ku me̩ adabi gba kwʼo̩wo̩-ma, ugwa e̩wñ me̩ ane̩ ef uwñ? I chaka chʼame̩nadure, ma me̩ e̩wñ ñw ame̩nadure ku ma dabi gba e̩go̩-wñ ge̩.

Me̩ ki la fe̩do̩ ame̩nebi-me̩, me̩ nachʼe̩nyo̩ ñwu ma, me̩ me̩ e̩wñ ñw one̩, me̩ we ekibeno akoji-wñ; tak e̩wñ uro̩me̩-me̩ anana, me̩ la amud amo̩ma O̩jo̩ Chamachala; todabu kʼowñ le̩ chemo̩la ñw abo ku ma ko̩ egwugwa e̩wñ kpʼame̩ne̩bibi.
Me̩ ki lejumomi one̩ alu kʼAta-me̩ chʼe̩nejumomi.
Me̩ ki la kajo̩ n taku ma akajo̩ e-me̩ n; me̩ ki la kpʼone̩ abi n, taku ma ñʼakpʼame̩ abi n; me̩ ki tʼo̩ no̩ ñw one̩, taku ma atʼo̩ no̩ ñwu me̩;

me̩ kʼe̩wñ chʼele, taku ma akʼe̩wñ chʼume̩ ele; ma añwa e̩ñwa o̩me̩me̩le̩ ñwu me̩, ma ake̩che̩mane̩, ma amiejo ki hime̩rʼo̩la-wñ, i ako̩ adaho, oñ ma adʼu mʼume̩ e̩do̩. Todu uñwa e̩wñ ku me̩ du ñwa ñw one̩, e-le̩ ma adu ñwa ñw ame̩ koji.
I ño̩ kpita ñwu ma kakini, Afeju neke ne̩ afeju le̩ o̩na? Ama meji añwa tef ura n?
Ako̩che̩ tʼe̩ne̩ ki ako̩ owñ e̩wñ le n; ama e̩ne̩ du ku ma fʼu ñwo̩che kpa adab e̩ne̩ ki ko̩ owñ e̩wñ.
Oñ e̩wñ chi kʼuwe̩ ago e̩wñ ke̩ke̩ ki dʼef eju o̩maye-we̩, kʼe̩ ma la nibe igbo oli ki dʼef eju e-we̩ n?

Abe̩k abile kʼe̩ neke ka ñw o̩maye-we̩ kakini, O̩maye, to̩no̩ kʼu mʼe̩wñ ke̩ke̩ ki dʼef eju-we̩ le̩ dutinyo̩, abu kʼuwe̩ onugo ma li igbo oli ki dʼef eju-we̩ n? Uwe̩ e̩nayechi, mʼigbo oli le̩ du kwef eju-we̩ ejodudu, e̩gba le̩ tak e̩ gane̩ nyo̩nyo̩ kʼe̩ mʼe̩wñ ke̩ke̩ ki dʼef eju o̩maye-we̩ dutinyo̩.
Todu oli o̩me̩me̩le̩ ki arʼe̩ro e̩che̩ de̩ n; omune̩ ge̩, oli e̩che̩ la arʼe̩ro o̩me̩me̩le̩ n.
Todu ef e̩ro e-wñ onugo oñ ma amʼoli okoke du kwo. Todu ma ako e̩ro ugbaikolo̩ kwʼo̩la oli abikeke n, i la chʼo̩la olige̩e̩le̩ oñ ma aka e̩ro achiwebe̩te̩ma n.
E̩ne̩nyo̩ akʼe̩wñ ki nyo̩ kwef e̩wñ akoko e̩nyo̩ e-e̩do̩-wñ dufu; e̩ne̩bibi la akʼe̩wñ bibi kwef e̩wñ bibi-wñ dufu; todu kwef e̩wñ ololo ki dʼef e̩do̩ oñ alu ako̩la.
E̩wñ chi ku me̩ do̩ mi ko̩ Ondu, Ondu, ku me̩ ma la che e̩wñ kʼu ka n?
E̩ne̩ du ki awʼugbo mi, kʼi la agbʼo̩la-mi, kʼi ache tʼeju-wñ, najiwe ñwu me̩ e̩wñ kʼi biu.

I che̩bi e̩ne̩ ki akʼunyi, e-kʼi fʼura e̩re̩ unyi-wñ gwa jiji, tak i mʼe̩re̩ unyi-wñ du nyʼane̩ oj apata; oñ e̩gba kʼomi wobi, i mucha lewa bʼunyi le̩ ma, i la bo̩jo̩ kʼi achʼunyi le̩ iche̩ n, todu ma fʼu ko̩ o̩me̩me̩le̩.
Ama e̩ne̩ ki agbo̩, kʼi ma la che n che̩bi e̩ne̩ ki fʼunyi ko̩ ane̩pe̩te̩, kʼi ma nʼe̩re̩ ane̩ n; tak omi mucha lewa bʼo ma, oñ i lewane̩ ababa, i la fʼunyi le̩ gwʼalache̩ tabale.
